import React, {useState} from 'react' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill' import axios from 'axios' import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import moment from 'moment' const Write = () => { const state = useLocation().state const [value, setValue]= useState(state?.description || ""); const upload = async()=>{ try { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("file", file) const res = await axios.post("/upload", formData) return res.data } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } const handleClick = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() const imgUrl = await upload() try { state ? await axios.put(`/posts/${state.id}`,{ desc: value }) : await axios.post(`/posts/`,{ desc: value }) } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
